subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
World Series
lead_paragraph: Eric Hosmer, Salvador Perez and Alcides Escobar were in New York again — this time to honor their defensive prowess, one of the key factors in Kansas City’s World Series victory over the Mets.
snippet: Eric Hosmer, Salvador Perez and Alcides Escobar were in New York again — this time to honor their defensive prowess, one of the key factors in Kansas City’s World Series victory over the Mets.
